nodes.text: Saul Ruiz is a television director. His directional career began with the episodes "Brothers of the Broken Horn," "The Future of the Force," "Legends of the Lasat," and "Shroud of Darkness" from the second season of Star Wars Rebels.

Before becoming an episode director, he worked on Star Wars: The Clone Wars as a 3D story artist, and was involved as an animator on the LucasArts games Star Wars: The Force Unleashed II and Lucidity.
